column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you have limited time in Chicago
column2: Art Institute should be one of the places you get to visit. Amazing selection of art from prehistoric to impressionist to modern and contemporary! Make sure you have at least 3 hours and eat before you go there because you will need all the time and energy to see all that this place has to offer! There are a few places for food and drinks at the museum
column3: albeit a bit pricy! Before leaving this place
column4: make sure to stop by the Museum Store- excellent selection of goodies and lots of marked down items!!!
